00011 #define DIMAGE_BOUNDS_CHECK 0

00013 typedef double DPixel;
00014 class Image;
00015 
00016 
00018 class DImage  
00019 {
00020 private :
00021   int nx,ny;
00022   DPixel *data;
00023 protected: 
00024   DPixel *data00; // address of DImage(0,0), by default same as data 
00025   int minindex, maxindex;
00026 public:
00027   DImage(const int Nx, const int Ny);
00028   DImage() : data(NULL) {Allocate(0,0);}
00029   void Allocate(const int Nx, const int Ny, int Init=1);
00030   ~DImage() { if (data) delete [] data;}
00031 
00033   //  inline DPixel& operator ()(const int i, const int j); 
00034   inline DPixel& operator ()(const int i, const int j) const
00035   {
00036 #if DIMAGE_BOUNDS_CHECK
00037     if (i+j*nx<minindex || i+j*nx>maxindex) 
00038       {
00039         cerr << "CATASTROPHE : DImage out of bounds " 
00040              << i << " " << j <<  " " << nx << " " << ny << endl;
00041       }
00042 #endif
00043     return data00[i+j*nx]; /* fortran/FITS convention */
00044   }
00045   
00047   DPixel* begin() const {return data;}
00048   int Nx() const {return nx;}
00049   int Ny() const {return ny;}
00051   void Zero() { memset(data,0,sizeof(DPixel)*nx*ny);}
00053   DPixel MinValue() const;
00055   DPixel MaxValue() const;
00057   void MinMaxValue(DPixel &Min, DPixel &Max) const;
00058   DImage(const DImage &Other);
00059   void dump();
00061   DPixel sum() const;
00063   void Normalize();
00065   DImage& operator = (const DImage&);
00066   DImage& operator = (const Image&);
00067   DImage& operator += (const DImage &Right);
00068   DImage& operator -= (const DImage &Right);
00069   DImage& operator *= (const double &Right);
00070   DImage& operator *= (const DImage &Right);
00071   DImage& operator /= (const double &Right);
00072   DImage& operator /= (const DImage &Right);
00073   DImage& operator += (const double &Right);
00074   DImage& operator -= (const double &Right);
00075   DImage& operator = (const double &Right);
00077   void readFits(const string &FitsName);
00078   void writeFits(const string &FitsName) const;
00080   DImage(const string &FitsName);
00081 };
00082 
00083 inline DImage operator + (const DImage &a, const DImage &b)
00084 {
00085   DImage c=a;
00086   c += b;
00087   return c;
00088 }
00089 
00090 inline DImage operator - (const DImage &a, const DImage &b)
00091 {
00092   DImage c=a;
00093   c -= b;
00094   return c;
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline DImage operator * (const DImage &a, const double &s)
00098 {
00099   DImage c=a;
00100   c *= s;
00101   return c;
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline DImage operator / (const DImage &a, const double &s)
00105 {
00106   DImage c=a;
00107   c /= s;
00108   return c;
00109 }
